title: Game minimizes and lags after downloaded curse
body:
#1. I recently downloaded curse and for some reason when i start up league the log in menu and from then on minimizes itself. Any idea why?
#2. When i am a few seconds into game my whole PC crashes and i have to force restart it. It also creates a sort of "buzz" sound. It only became a problem after i came back from a holiday in Russia before everything ran smoothly.

Thank you!!

replies.body: Does this happen if you close out Curse or uninstall it entirely? This sounds an awful lot like some issues between Windows 10 and the Xbox Game Bar, but I wanted to see if this was only caused by Curse.
